name: June
bio: After some years of Node.js I am working as a Go developer now. I am very impressed by Go's strong principles, ease of use and all the out-of-the-box tooling.

name: John Reese
bio: I am a software engineer with a passion for testing. If you have any questions about the track or the language in general, feel free to ask; I'd love to hear them.

name: Jaime Martinez
bio: I first started working with Go over 4 years ago writing REST APIs, I fell in love! I have been working with it ever since. I love spreading the Go-love, I hope can do that here too!
